name: expressive_nft
description: # Project Dependencies 1. npm i ethers, used to interact with ethereum blockchain 2. npm i hardhat, compiles contracts and used to deploy. 3. npm i @nomiclabs/hardhat-waffle ethereum-waffle chai @nomiclabs/hardhat-ethers web3modal @openzepplin/contracts 4. chai is used for testing (assertions) 5. npm i ipfs-http-client, this is used for storage and hosting the uri, images and files.  6. npm i axios 7. npm i add -D tailwindcss@latest postcss@latest autoprefixer@latest

scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.test:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run test" "cd client && npm run test"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd expressive-nfts-market && npm run dev"
